name: Worm Game (Matzeall)
description:
Worm Game is a chaotic "Snake"-like vertical-scroller for casual players.

Worm game is a casual game in which you have to meander through obstacles and collect worm segments with different effects. Depending on the type and number of worm segments you have, the way you play can change very drastically.

Please remember this is only a Prototype. It contains 3 Levels which can be fairly difficult for new players.  If enough people like the game (like 10 people maybe), I will work on a full release with more and better balanced content.

But I think the way it is can be quite fun for at least 10 minutes.

For now you need to install it yourself with the .apk-file on your phone. If I release the full game it will be downloadable from the PlayStore / Appstore. 

Any feedback in the comments is appreciated :)

Also if someone has an idea for a better name than "Worm-Game" PLEASE let me know
